q_ch: 对于Master Sewers 已经完成的所有缝纫任务，有哪些是在2024年2月1日之后创建的?
q_en: For all sewing tasks completed by Master Sewers, which ones were created after February 1, 2024?
hint: Don't ignore the time condition of February 1, 2024
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the details of the sewing tasks completed by the "Master Sewers" group that were created after February 1, 2024. 🎉

### Sewing Tasks by Master Sewers

| Task ID | Task Name | Creation Date |
|---------|-----------|---------------|
| 101     | Fancy Dress | 2024-02-15   |
| 102     | Elegant Suit | 2024-03-01   |

These are the tasks that fit your criteria. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Master Sewers"
